original: Ivar Otto Adolf, direktör, Jonsered, f. r8/5/80 i Lidköping av grossh. Otto A. W. o. Disa Påhlman. G. 06 m. Aida Eckerbom. Barn: Ann-Margret f. 07, g. m. dr.-ing. H. Dier-garten, Sigurd 09, med. lic., Disa Birgitta V2, ig. m. bergsing. K. H. B. Rin-man. — Stud:ex. i Skara 99, avg:ex. fr. KTH 03. Bitr. ing. v. Norrköp. stads byggn :ko:nt. 03-04, ing. ]i. drät-s :kamm. i Malmö 05-07, avd:chef v. Malmö stads vatt :ledn:- o. kloakverk 08-20, dir. f. Gbgs spårväg. 21-26, disponent v. Jonsereds Fabr. A-B 26-46. Ordf. i styr. f. Jonsereds Fabr. A-B m. fl. ’bol. Skr.: art. i Tekn. tidskr. m. fl. RVO 21. , Johan Gustaf, disponent, civilingenjör, Halmstad, if. 26/9/75 i Ho-by, Malmöh. 1., av Robert W. o. Ida Pettersson. G. 03 m. Oilga Tengbeng. Barn: John f. 04, major, Torsten 08, civiling., Märtha 11, g. m. bryggm. K. E. Anjou, Bertil Johan f. 12, d. 14, Eskil f. 17, civilekon. — Stud:ex. i Ystad 95, avg:ex. fr. KTH (E) 99’. Ing. v. AS Smith, Mygind & Hiittem^eyer i Köp enhamin 99-01, v. Niles Tool Works Co. i Hamilton, Ohio, 01-04, v. Bement Miles Co. i Philadelpliia 04-05, ass. chief draughtsman v. Niles Tood Wonks Co. 05-07, ing. v. Lidköp. mek. venkst. 07-10, disponent v. Halmistads Nya Verkstads A-B 10-44, pens. 44. Styr:led. i Sydsv. Kraft A-B 32-45. Led. av stadsfuHm. 21-42, av byggn :nd 12-36, av elverksstyr. 22-47 o. v. ordf. där 32-47, led. av las :dir. fr. 20, v. ordf. där fr. 34, styr :led. i A-B Malcus Holmqvist fr. 43, i Hailmstads Nya Verkst. A-B sed. 11. Ordf. i Hatestads ing:fören. 18-20, v. ordf. 32. Medl. av Sv. tekn:fören. fr. 96. RVO, PatrstGM.
translated:
Ivar Otto Adolf, director, Jonsered, b. 5/8/1880 in Lidköping to wholesale merchant Otto A. W. and Disa Påhlman. Married in 1906 to Aida Eckerbom. Children: Ann-Margret b. 1907, married to Dr. Ing. H. Diergarten, Sigurd b. 1909, medical licentiate, Disa Birgitta b. 19xx, married to mining engineer K. H. B. Rinman. — High school graduate in Skara 1899, graduate from KTH (Royal Institute of Technology) 1903. Assistant engineer at Norrköping city building committee 1903-1904, engineer at Malmö municipality taxation chamber 1905-1907, department head at Malmö city water and sewer works 1908-1920, director of Gothenburg tramway company 1921-1926, manager of Jonsereds Fabr. A-B 1926-1946. Chairman of the board of Jonsereds Fabr. A-B and other companies. Published articles in Teknisk Tidskrift and others. Order of Vasa recipient in 1921. 

Johan Gustaf, manager, civil engineer, Halmstad, b. 26/9/1875 in Ho-by, Malmöhus county, son of Robert W. and Ida Pettersson. Married in 1903 to Oilga Tengbeng. Children: John b. 1904, major, Torsten b. 1908, civil engineer, Märtha b. 1911, married to brewer K. E. Anjou, Bertil Johan b. 1912, d. 1914, Eskil b. 1917, economist. High school graduate in Ystad 1895, graduate from KTH (Mechanical Engineering) 1899. Engineer at AS Smith, Mygind & Hiittem^eyer in Copenhagen 1899-1901, at Niles Tool Works Co. in Hamilton, Ohio, 1901-1904, at Bement Miles Co. in Philadelphia 1904-1905, assistant chief draughtsman at Niles Tood Wonks Co. 1905-1907, engineer at Lidköping mechanical works 1907-1910, manager of Halmstad Nya Verkstads A-B 1910-1944, retired 1944. Board member of Sydsvenska Kraft A-B 1932-1945. Member of Halmstad city council 1921-1942, construction committee 1912-1936, power company board 1922-1947 (vice chairman from 1932-1947), county hospital board member from 1920 (vice chairman from 1934), board member of A-B Malcus Holmqvist from 1943, board member of Halmstad Nya Verkst. A-B since 1911. Chairman of Halmstad engineering association 1918-1920, vice chairman from 1932. Member of Swedish technical association since 1896. Order of Vasa recipient.
